text: The Wii Balance Board (called Wii Board in Europe) is a balance board accessory made for Nintendo's Wii and Wii U game console."Wi Fit: How To Stay Balanced," GamePro 235 (April 2008): 19. It was first used for Wii Fit, and was also used for other games, including We Ski. ==References== Category:Wii hardware
title: Wii Balance Board
